results.title: Lights and shadows on the use of metformin in pregnancy: from the preconception phase to breastfeeding and beyond
results.text_hl: Despite the multitude of RCTs conducted, high-quality RCTs designed to answer the specific question of the comparative efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ and with or without @<m>DISEASE_Obesity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ are still lacking.
